vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πᾰλαιότης, ητος, ἡ,
age, π. καὶ πλῆθος ἐτῶν [Refs 4th c.BC+]; of seeds, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 more frequently antiquity, obsoleteness, π. γὰρ τῷ λόγῳ γ᾽ ἔνεστί τις [Refs 5th c.BC+]; π. γράμματος, opposed to καινότης πνεύματος, [NT+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: the old way, obsoleteness, age oldness
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
the old way, obsoleteness, age oldness
oldness, obsoleteness, the old way Rom. 7:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: antigüedad, vejez ; servir bajo el régimen viejo de la letra, servir bajo una ley ya anticuada (ROM.7:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cũ kĩ; sự lỗi thời; sự trở thành quá thời
